zone.line: "putting forth her green figs"
and on the vaulted roofs grow a multitude
fig tree
of wild shrubs, the wild olive & the myrtle
the olive & the banana trees
and intricate brambles, and entagled weeds
strange feathery
& ^ plants I never saw before. The stones are
immensely massive, but & they jut out one
from the other. There are terrible rifts in
the wall, & high windows thro which
bright
you see the heavens blue heaven. There
seem to be more than a thousand arches
some ruined some entire & they are all
broken
immensely high & wide. Some are shattered
& stand forth in great heaps and the
underwood is tufted on their crumbling
summits lie
height. Around us are enormous columns
———— shattered & shapeless &
fragments of capitals & cornice loaded with
delicate sculptures
It is open to the sky? said the old man.
no Yes & or
I see the liquid depth of Heaven above
